ITEM.NAME: EMBEDDED
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_203' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MapR_EMR' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

ITEM.NAME: STANDALONE
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MAPRED_JT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1'))

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPRED_JT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false' AND SET_MAPRED_JT=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1'))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1')) AND (SET_RESOURCE_MANAGER=='true')

ITEM.NAME: AVRO
ITEM.SHOW_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR212') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR213') OR (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'true') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: FIELD_ESCAPE_BY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LIKE_TABLE=='false') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='STORAGE') AND (SET_SERDE_ROW_FORMAT=='false') AND (SET_ROW_FORMAT=='true') AND (SET_FIELD_TERMINATED_BY=='true') AND (SET_FIELD_ESCAPE_BY=='true') AND (STORAGE_FORMAT!='AVRO')

PARAMETER.NAME: CLUSTERED_BY_AND_SKEWED_BY
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: "CLUSTERED BY (col_name, col_name, ...) [SORTED BY (col_name [ASC|DESC], ...)] INTO num_buckets BUCKETS] SKEWED BY (col_name, col_name, ...) ON ([(col_value, col_value, ...), ...|col_value, col_value, ...]) "

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: If you are on Windows, add a '/' in front of the path you type in

IMPORT.NAME: Driver-Hadoop-0.20.203
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_0_20_203' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MapR_EMR') and (USE_EXISTING_CONNECTION == 'false') AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'
